items.value: %02@ of %01@ has been captivated by the beauty and magnificence of %10@, the spouse of %12@ of %11@. Admiring %96b from the distance, %87b begins to fall in love and become obsessed.
%02@ of %01@ is completely obsessed and consumed by evil thoughts. %87a sent %00@ to abduct %10@.
%00@ has been caught and executed in attempting to abduct %10@.
%00@ has been caught but is secretly allowed by %12@ to continue the abduction in an attempt to get rid of %93b spouse probably because of hatred.
%10@ has been abducted by %00@. %12@ will not do anything because %90b secretly allowed it to happen.
%10@ has been abducted by %00@. %12@ assembled a search party to look for %96b.
%11@ won the war. %10@ has been returned.
%11@ won the war. %10@ has committed suicide because %95b couldn't stand returning to someone %95b doesn't love.
%10@ tried and successfully assassinated %02@ because of hatred. %10@ is now the new ruler of %01@.
%10@ tried to assassinate %02@ because of hatred. %95a failed and has been executed.
%10@ declared war against %96b former spouse, %12@, because of hatred and anger.
%01@ won the war. %10@ will stay in the arms of %02@.
The news about the new spouse of %02@ has reached %11@. %12@ has found out about the abduction.
